mapper.select: select if(bc3.name is not null, bc3.name, '') as lv1, if(bc2.name is not null, bc2.name, '') as lv2, bc1.name as lv3, bc1.code from sp_basic_city bc1 left join sp_basic_city bc2 on bc1.pcode = bc2.code left join sp_basic_city bc3 on bc2.pcode = bc3.code where bc1.`name` like concat('%', #{s}, '%') or bc1.`code` like concat('%', #{s}, '%') or bc1.jianpin like concat('%', #{s}, '%') or bc1.pinyin like concat('%', #{s}, '%') order by bc1.code asc limit 0, 20
